about_the_game:
This DLC is required for all non-personal use of WalkinVR including Business, Research, Clinics, Foundations, Universities, Schools, Therapy Centers, and other Organisations.

More info available at

With this DLC following extra features are available:
  • Hand tracking with other than Xbox Kinect camera: Orbbec, Intel RealSense, Asus Xtion, Kinec Azure

With this DLC following extra features are in development:
  • Ability to create profiles for different players and switch between them.
  • Locally collecting and exporting movement data for further analysis.
detailed_description:
This DLC is required for all non-personal use of WalkinVR including Business, Research, Clinics, Foundations, Universities, Schools, Therapy Centers, and other Organisations.

More info available at

With this DLC following extra features are available:
  • Hand tracking with other than Xbox Kinect camera: Orbbec, Intel RealSense, Asus Xtion, Kinec Azure

With this DLC following extra features are in development:

  • Locally collecting and exporting movement data for further analysis.

name: WalkinVR - Professional

package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.
package_groups.name: default

subs.option_description: $29.99 at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $119.99.

package_groups.title: Buy WalkinVR - Professional

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

price_overview.recurring_sub_desc: $29.99 at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $119.99.

short_description: This DLC is required for all non-personal use of WalkinVR including: Business, Research, Clinic, Foundations, Universities, Schools, Therapy Centers, and other Organisations. It contains also extra features for professional users.
